profile_picture_alt: Animated profile picture of Jake van Halder

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle_prefix: I'm entering my final year as a Computer Science major at Washington State University. As a SWE Intern at Schweitzer Engineering Laboratories, I focus on building scalable, enterprise-grade software and improving system performance. I also develop the frontend for a GIS-based
about.subtitle_suffix: web application that visualizes hydrologic and environmental data across Western U.S. and Canadian watersheds. If you need someone who's eager to learn, ready to innovate, and dedicated to delivering results, let's chat!

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: A collection of my personal projects

utility.title: Utility Watershed Analytics
utility.description: A GIS-based watershed analytics web application, designed to visualize and analyze hydrologic and environmental data across western U.S. & Canadian watersheds

pulse.title: Pulse
pulse.description: Pulse is a C# ASP.NET Core MVC application developed to help the user focus on important goals and tasks in their upcoming week.

graph.title: Graph Theorist's Sketchpad
graph.description: A 3D Three.js interactive tool for creating, visualizing, and analyzing graphs.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: Check out how I made this portfolio using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript!
